column4: help!  i'm getting an error when i try to login (your session only lasteed less than 10 seconds).... detials say:  /etc/gdm/Xsession: Beginning sessions setup.... ;  mkdtemp: private socket dir: Permission denied  ..... how do i fix?
/etc/init.d/gdm stop stops your loginmanager and then switch with alt+F1 to your console, for permanetly start your xxbunto install rcconf and switsch off gdm
startx or gdm for starting then ..
what do u mean permanetly start your xxbunto instal rcconmf
i'm not clear on ur directions
you can handle your startingdeamons with rcconf
gdm = gnomedisplaymanager

sudo aptitude install rcconf
then sudo rcconf

i switched off logingui, cuz i couldn't login with gdm (remember session quit)

switch off your gdm
next time you boot it dont starts your gui

ther are no instrucitons
